sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.TASK_SMRY_INFO_VAL_TXT FROM TASK_SMRY_INFO A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.TASK_SMRY_INFO_TP_CD = #taskSmryInfoTpCd# ORDER BY A.TASK_SMRY_INFO_NUM

SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition02$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition03$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition04$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition05$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition06$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition07$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition08$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition09$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition10$ UNION ALL SELECT A.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,A.ORG_LAYER_NUM AS ORG_LAYER_NUM ,A.FIRST_ORG_CD AS FIRST_ORG_CD ,A.FIRST_ORG_NM AS FIRST_ORG_NM ,A.SCD_ORG_CD AS SCD_ORG_CD ,A.SCD_ORG_NM AS SCD_ORG_NM ,A.THIRD_ORG_CD AS THIRD_ORG_CD ,A.THIRD_ORG_NM AS THIRD_ORG_NM ,A.FRTH_ORG_CD AS FRTH_ORG_CD ,A.FRTH_ORG_NM AS FRTH_ORG_NM ,A.FIFTH_ORG_CD AS FIFTH_ORG_CD ,A.FIFTH_ORG_NM AS FIFTH_ORG_NM ,A.SIXTH_ORG_CD AS SIXTH_ORG_CD ,A.SIXTH_ORG_NM AS SIXTH_ORG_NM ,A.SVNTH_ORG_CD AS SVNTH_ORG_CD ,A.SVNTH_ORG_NM AS SVNTH_ORG_NM ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_CD AS EIGHTH_ORG_CD ,A.EIGHTH_ORG_NM AS EIGHTH_ORG_NM ,A.NINTH_ORG_CD AS NINTH_ORG_CD ,A.NINTH_ORG_NM AS NINTH_ORG_NM ,A.TENTH_ORG_CD AS TENTH_ORG_CD ,A.TENTH_ORG_NM AS TENTH_ORG_NM ,A.ELVTH_ORG_CD AS ELVTH_ORG_CD ,A.ELVTH_ORG_NM AS ELVTH_ORG_NM
,C.STRU_DFN_CD AS STRU_DFN_CD
FROM ORG_STRU A ,ORG_HRCH_STRU_DFN B ,STRU_DFN C WHERE $searchCondition11$
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TTL_IN_PROC_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,SVC_TASK_STS STS ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS PRT_WAIT_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS SPCL_WAIT_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,SVC_TASK_STS STS ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CUST_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,DS_SVC_CALL_TP DSCT ,SVC_TASK_STS STS ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CRAT_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AVAL_TECH_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TM.TECH_TOC_CD FROM S21_ORG SO ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_PSN SP ,TECH_MSTR TM WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS AFT_HOUR_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,SVC_TASK_STS STS ,DS_SVC_CALL_TP DSCT ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS AFT_HOUR_AVAL_TECH_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TM.TECH_TOC_CD FROM S21_ORG SO ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_PSN SP ,TECH_MSTR TM ,TECH_UPD_INFO TUI WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CLO_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS PRT_FAIL_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS POST_ENTRY_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )

SELECT NVL(SUM(SVC_RSP_TM_NUM), 0) AS SUM_SVC_RSP_TM_NUM ,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,DS_SVC_CALL_TP DSCT ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )

SELECT NVL(SUM(SVC_RSP_TM_NUM), 0) AS SUM_SVC_RSP_TM_NUM ,COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )

SELECT NVL(SUM(SVC_RSP_TM_NUM), 0) AS CUST_TASK_TTL_RSP_AOT FROM ( SELECT ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,DS_SVC_CALL_TP DSCT ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CLO_CUST_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,DS_SVC_CALL_TP DSCT ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT NVL(SUM(SVC_RSP_TM_NUM), 0) AS ALL_TASK_TTL_RSP_AOT FROM ( SELECT ST.SVC_RSP_TM_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CLO_ALL_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ESCL_TASK_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ST.SVC_TASK_NUM FROM SVC_TASK ST ,FSR_VISIT FSR ,S21_PSN SP ,ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_ORG SO WHERE $techAsign01$ $techAsign02$ )
